title: BRIEF-Ecargo Holdings Announces JV To Distribute FMCG In Vietnam And Cambodia
text:
BRIEF-Ecargo Holdings Announces JV To Distribute FMCG In Vietnam And Cambodia

Stock Markets 44 minutes ago (Sep 18, 2019 08:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Ecargo Holdings Announces JV To Distribute FMCG In Vietnam And Cambodia Sept 18 (Reuters) - eCargo Holdings Ltd : * ANNOUNCES FORMATION OF JV TO UNDERTAKE DISTRIBUTION OF FAST-MOVING CONSUMER GOODS IN VIETNAM AND CAMBODIA * ABG GROUP HAS ENTERED INTO AN AGREEMENT TO DISTRIBUTE FIRST ORDER OF PRODUCTS IN VIETNAM AND CAMBODIA, WITH A VALUE OF AUD1.3 MILLION * ECG HOLDING TO HOLD 33% STAKE IN JV ASEAN BUSINESS GROUP PTY LTD

BRIEF-Ecargo Holdings Announces JV To Distribute FMCG In Vietnam And Cambodia
description: BRIEF-Ecargo Holdings Announces JV To Distribute FMCG In Vietnam And Cambodia
